data.title: Hard To Imagine Retirement Income Portfolio Without These 2 Picks
data.text: Typically, investors put a focus on high-yield securities if the goal is to live off from portfolio income streams. data.title: Nvidia to launch downgraded AI chip for China after US export curbs – Reuters
data.text: Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA, ETR:NVD) is preparing to launch a lower-spec version of its H20 artificial intelligence chip in China as early as July, according to a Reuters exclusive citing three sources. The move follows fresh US export restrictions that effectively barred the original H20 from the Chinese market.

data.title: 2 Magnificent Seven Stocks that are Screaming Buys Today
data.text: By the end of last year, Magnificent Seven stocks may have seemed out of reach for many investors. These top technology players saw their shares surge -- and they even led gains in the S&P 500 index -- on optimism about the ability of artificial intelligence (AI) to revolutionize business and our daily lives.

data.title: Exclusive: Nvidia modifies H20 chip for China to overcome US export controls, sources say
data.text: Nvidia plans to release a downgraded version of its H20 artificial intelligence chip for China in the next two months, following U.S. export restrictions on the original model, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.

data.title: AMD vs. Nvidia: Which Artificial Intelligence Stock Should You Buy on the Dip?
data.text: Has the excitement surrounding artificial intelligence (AI) stocks cooled off? Many top AI stocks are down this year, including Advanced Micro Devices (AMD 1.31%), better known as just AMD, and Nvidia (NVDA 0.28%).
